channel.title: [pi] quick question [pi]
channel.description:
hey i understand the layout for drops, for example my barrows:
[code]#Dharok the Wretched 2026:30 4717:1 4719:1 4721:1 4723:1 995:2000000 995:500000[/code]
but i dont understand the ratio part, i know its from 1 to 100 but whats most common and whats least common (1 or 100? )
and whats good rate for about 1 drop out of 10 kills

item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

how higher the ratio number how rarer the drops

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] quick question [pi]
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

npcid:rarity itemid:amount itemid:amount
raredropitemid:amount raredropitemid:amount

It randomly picks an item from the top line, and if the “dice” rolls your rarity number, it selects an item from the second line. The other npcdrop config file is your 100% drops (items that drop constantly).

At least that’s what I understand from it. Experiment.

Read full topic
